channel.title: Connection Lost Error?
channel.description:
Whenever i trade with my npc with a shop, i get connection lost, then reconnect.
Here is the error message on the server:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -123 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19974 at client.packetProcess(client.java:18717) at client.packetSending(client.java:18670) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:51) pimpscape Server (fatal) - exception
here are the files it mentions: http://www.mediafire.com/?p3hzfbh7u549h8f

item.title: Connection Lost Error?
item.dc:creator: @daygen4545 daygen4545
item.description:
@daygen4545 wrote:

thanks that fixed itâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: Connection Lost Error?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

NPCSlot = ((misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000) - 128);
Thats the problem I believe.
Try
NPCSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();

Read full topic
